title: What is the English translation of this Punjabi song lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: I want to add that actual meaning may come out somewhat different when we translate a song or a poem into another language, rhymes are difficult to maintain. However for understanding, below translation may be helpful, and any addition or edit/suggestion would be always welcomed. I assumed here that word malook means - delicate. Well, don’t look for its English translation. Punjabi songs sound best in their flow and flair. Just enjoy them ,for they touch your soul. Still, take this if you are in need of its translation:- Pyar hunda phullan toh malook sohneya Jiwe hundi morni di kook sohneya Door kitte janglan ch nachdi fireh Shehar takk sunn jandi hoouk sohneya  Love is delicate like flowers Like the screams of a peacock they are usually dancing around far in the forests but they can be heard out in the city  Sajjan raazi ho jaawe Fer vi oh roula nahio payida paagla  If your lover says " Yes" Even then you shouldn't talk about it out loud  Sajjan raazi ho jaawe Fer vi oh roula nahio payida paagla  Ishq hunda heereyan de warga Oh jag tohn lukkayida paagla Sajjan raazi ho jaawe fer vi Oh roula naiyo paayida  Love is like diamonds You should hide it from the world If your lover says " Yes" Even then you shouldn't talk about it out loud  Ae roule vich haaniya ee haaniya Ke koi maaru bhaniya te kanniya Tu kar na naddaniya veeraniya Ke rul jau jawaniya ve jaaniya  There is only loss in making it public Someone will throw taunts (our way) Don't be naive, otherwise in sadness will the youth be spent, my love   Ae zindagi lasaani aa Aes nu aiwe nahi gawaayi da pagla (x2)  This life is precious/unique You shouldn't waste it for no reason, stupid.  Ishq hunda heereyan de warga Oh jag tohn lukkayida paagla Sajjan raazi ho jaawe fer vi Oh roula naiyo paayida  Ke loki kithe jarde ne yaariyan Ke ae tan rehnde karde tiyariyan Haan ranjhe ne taan majhiyan vi chhariyan Te eint vekh ho giya khowariya  When is the world every happy about lovers/relationships They are always ready  Look Ranjha even grazed cattle (for love) but in the end it was all for nothing  Ah jagg diya rasma niyariyan Oh khud nu bachayida pagla (x2)  The ways of this world are unique You should save yourself, stupid  Ishq hunda heereya de varga Oh jagg tu lukayi da pagla Sajjan razi ho jawe Fer vi oh raula naiyo payida pagla  Ho teriyan taan sachiya preetiyan Sahan chh tere rachiya preetiyan Jaddon vi kadi nachiya preetiyan Kise nu kadon jachiya preetiyan  Your love is true Love is soaked in you Whenever love has every danced (expressed itself) When has it ever made others happy   Pyaar tandha kachiyan Bewakoofa ae sama nahio bhulayi da pagla (x2)  Threads of love are weak You shouldn't forget the time(time you live in), stupid  Ishq hunda heereya de varga Oh jagg tu lukayi da pagla Sajjan raazi ho jaave Fer vi oh roula nahio payida pagla  Ke duniya ta massle ee bhaldi Ke maadi jahi gal vi uchaaldi Utaar dindi khal vi eh vaal di Te aashiqan di zindagi nu galdi  The world is always looking for things to pick on It makes a mountain out of a molehill It even attempts shed the skin of a hair And it always try to ruin the lives of lovers  Ae rooh teri sadraan nu bhaal di Oh dil ni dukhayi da pagla (x2)   Your soul is looking for dreams/hopes You should never hurt your heart, stupid.   Ishq hunda heereya de varga Oh jagg tu lukayi da pagla Sajjan raazi ho jawe Fer vi oh roula naiyo payida pagla  Eh ramaj lukki lawe moorkha Dilan da booha dho lawi moorkha Raatan tu khaab kho lawi moorkha Te geetan ch parhu lawi moorkha  Hide this secret, stupid.  Close the gates of your heart, stupid Grab the dreams from nights, stupid and weave them in your songs, stupid  Suraan nu zara cho lawi Sartaaj Aidan naiyo gayida pagla (x2)  Sing in proper notes Sartaj You shouldn't sing like this  Ishq hunda heereya de varga Oh jagg tu lukkayi da pagla Sajjan razi ho jawe Fer vi oh roula naiyo payida pagla  Pyar hunda phullan toh malook sohneya Jiwe hundi morni di kook sohneya Door kitte janglan ch nachdi fireh Shehar takk sunn jandi hoouk sohneya
